chartTitle: Top Ten Prime Vendors by M/WBE Sub Spending
widgetDataLoader:
$where_filters = array();
    foreach($node->widgetConfig->requestParams as $param=>$value){
        $where_filters[] = _widget_build_sql_condition(' a1.' . $param, $value);
    }

    if(count($where_filters) > 0){
        $where_filter = ' where ' . implode(' and ' , $where_filters);
    }

	$mwbe_filter = RequestUtilities::getRequestParamValue('mwbe');
    $sort_column = 4;
	switch($mwbe_filter){
		case '2' :
        case '3' :
        case '4~5' :
        case '6' :
        case '7' :
        case '9' :
        case '11' :
        case '99' :
			$sort_column = 4;
			break;
	}

$sql = '
select legal_name, vendor_id, prime_minority_type_id, total_spending_amount 

from (

    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 4 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 5 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 2 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 9 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 3 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 11 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 2 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 3 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 4 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 5 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 6 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 9 THEN total_spending_amount WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 99 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 6 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 99 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 
 


    UNION 
 


    select legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id vendor_id,prime_minority_type_id, 

    SUM( CASE WHEN prime_minority_type_id = 7 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) total_spending_amount 

    from aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities a1 join vendor ra on ra.vendor_id = a1.prime_vendor_id 

    ' . $where_filter . ' 

    group by legal_name, a1.prime_vendor_id,a1.prime_minority_type_id 

) all_spending where all_spending.total_spending_amount > 0 

order by all_spending.total_spending_amount desc limit 10 

';
//log_error('SQQQLLL: 


' . $sql);

    $node->data  = _checkbook_project_execute_sql($sql);
